product_name: Sea to Summit Alpha Light Spoon - Long
long_description: At 8.5 in. long, the Sea To Summit Alpha Light spoon lets you scrape up every last bite of food from your freeze-dried pouch without getting your hands all messy. Made from aircraft-grade 7075-T6 aluminum alloy that is hard anodized for excellent durability. Spoon weighs in at a mere 0.4 oz. Includes a small accessory carabiner so you can clip the spoon to a pack, mug or additional utensils. And just a heads up, the packaging is completely recyclable, so don't let us catch you throwing it away!
short_description: At 8.5 in. long, the Sea To Summit Alpha Light spoon lets you scrape up every last bite of food from your freeze-dried pouch without getting your hands all messy.
